title: Quirks
text: theme uses partials override default templates navbar head. pinned specific commit. notice theme behind upstream, please open issue. Since theme overrides navbar partial insert logo, anything HTML put -title appear logo. left functionality website wouldn’t fail silently eat input, hazard won’t want put anything logo. want put things before_title copy navbar.HTML package’s pkgdown configuration edit , putting HTML says {#includes}{{{before_navbar}}}{{/includes}}.

title: Quirks
text: template copies Stan hex logo root references manually templates, pkgdown doens’t like. , ’ll get errors like actually navigate page logo . may fix/change referencing man/figures/logo (also copied ).
code: Missing images in .github/CONTRIBUTING.md: logo.png ℹ pkgdown can only use images in man/figures and vignettes

title: Stan pkgdown website styling
text: Built vein quarto-config. Styling Stan sites built pkgdown. use theme non-Stan package. See vignette setup instructions. concerns/help/anything, open issue /ping Stan Slack. Source.
